title: Create User Login API Endpoint for VitaTrack
instruction: Implement secure user login API endpoint for VitaTrack platform. Create email/password authentication, account verification checking, login attempt tracking, and account lockout protection. Implement device fingerprinting, suspicious activity detection, and security notifications. Setup session management, remember me functionality, and multi-device login tracking. Include login analytics, geographic location tracking, and security event logging. Configure rate limiting and brute force protection.
